word_mean: 屈光参差：两眼屈光不同

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To analysis the correlation between the ocular components and the anisometropia in children.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的:分 析儿童屈光参差眼的眼球屈光结构与屈光不正的关系.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the relationship between the degree of anisometropia and the depth of amblyopia.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨双眼屈光参差程度与弱视程度的关系.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion: The axial length was the most significant factor to the childrens anisometropia.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 眼轴长度差是产生双眼屈光参差的主要因素,这对这类病人的临床屈光矫正有指导意义.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...生多由以下因素造成：(1)缺乏足够的刺激；(2)双眼竞争；(3)单眼（或双眼）抑制。在诸多的病因中，屈光参差（anisometropia）和调节性内斜视(accommodative esotropia)引起的弱视约占所有弱视患者的90％。.
anisometrope 屈光参差者anisometropia 屈光不等anisophoria 垂直向隐斜视
anisometric 不等轴的anisometropia 两眼不等折射，屈光参差anisometropic eye 屈光参差眼
BOLD-fMRI Study of Myopic Anisometropia近视性屈光参差的功能性磁共振成像研究
